entry.title: Apple Logo Standards
entry.content:
This is a poster (scanned in overlapping sections) outlining the standards for displaying Apple Computer’s logo in the late 1980’s. The rainbow-style Apple logo was dropped when Steve Jobs returned a decade later.


Publication Date 1987
Publisher Apple
Language English
Identifier-ark ark:/13960/t9q31mq40
Tags Logo, standards manual, apple, computers.
Rights Seems to still be under the copyright of Apple Computers.
